Total biaya layanan: Rp 1.000.000 * 2% = Rp 20.000
Total biaya pengembalian: Rp 1.000.000 + (Rp 1.000.000 * 14%/365 * 91) + (Rp 1.000.000 * 2%) = Rp 1.054.904
